import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; import './About.css' React.useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); function About() { return ( <>

ABOUT

Introduction:

This website was developed as a course project for EG6328 - Software Engineering - at St. Mary's University. The inspiritaion behind this idea is that we wanted to create a centralized point of contact for students, tutors, and professors. This site offers a convenient all-in-one-place for students to contact each in a private and secure manner regarding course material such as lecture notes and recordings, questions, and/or quiz/exam reviews.



Implementation:

To build this website we used the 'big three' in front-end development - JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS. To develop the user interface we took advantage of the open-source JS library known as React; this allowed us to create an elegant interface as well as various UI components that we integrated into this website. Regarding backend we decided to use MySQL.



Creators:

 1. Hi, my name is Darian Jennings, I am a Computer Engineering major at St. Mary's Univeristy in San Antonio Texas..



 2. Hi, my name is Gabi Sandoval....



Terms of Study:

The following POLICIES are to be appplied by all memebers of this server with no execptions:

1. The server does not tolerate any form of descrimination, hazing, bullying ect.

2. Members will uphold St.Mary's Guidlines.

3. This website does not promote any type of academic dishonesty whatsoever.

); } export default About;
